Melee Weapon Attack:
 +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 
Hit:
 1 piercing damage.

description:
Tiny beast, unaligned
A quipper is a carnivorous fish with sharp teeth. Quippers can adapt to any aquatic environment, including cold subterranean lakes. They frequently
gather in swarms; the statistics for a swarm of quippers appear later in this appendix.

The quipper has advantage on melee attack rolls against any creature that doesn't have all its hit points.
The quipper can breathe only underwater.

name: Quipper
